name: #004 working on the Wowie Jam! new art
name_original: #004 working on the Wowie Jam! new art
description:
You must mouse click inside the game in order to be able to control it

Left spaceship is purple - thrust with Z key and the A key resets the board

Right spaceship is green - thrust with / key and the ' key resets the board

Woring on the Wowie Jam!

https://81766.com/tag/wowie-jam/
